entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who has an interaction with Hermione. He is described as someone who said he was going to meet Hermione and upset Cho in the process.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who is talking to Harry and Ron. She is described as someone who is trying to get away quickly and mentions that Harry thinks she is ugly.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who comes into the Hall splattered with mud and looking grumpy. He is compared to Harry by Hermione.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as someone who tried to make Harry jealous when he said he was going to meet Hermione.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione have an interaction where they talk about meeting each other.
Cho tries to make Harry jealous when he says he is going to meet Hermione.
Hermione compares Ron to Harry saying that Ron is not worse than Harry.
